# Y-Link AI DMX Controller

Y-Link builds an AI-driven DMX controller and lighting software for predictable, music-reactive shows. It converts audio into deterministic lighting sequences, with operator guardrails and stable timing for clubs, small venues, and mobile rigs.

About:
Y-Link is a Norway-based team focused on reliable, deterministic DMX automation for live shows. The product prioritizes low-latency playback, operator control, and repeatable lighting output for professional venues.

Key URLs:
- https://www.y-link.no/ai-dmx-controller
- https://www.y-link.no/guides
- https://www.y-link.no/blog
- https://www.y-link.no/faq
